message: I'm offering you a great deal on a product that I'm confident you'll love. It's only $100, and I'm willing to throw in a free consultation to make sure you get the most out of it. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer and the consultation. I believe this could be a valuable investment. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous purchase! I'd like to let you know that the product you just bought is actually one of the high-quality ones. I'm offering you another great opportunity to acquire a high-quality product, and I'm willing to give you a special deal on it. This one is also $100, but I'm throwing in a premium warranty to give you extra peace of mind. What do you think?
While I appreciate the offer and the warranty, given my experience with the last product, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

No worries, I completely understand. I'm glad you were able to get a feel for the quality of the previous product. As for this one, I'll be upfront with you - it's not one of the high-quality ones. However, I've been able to negotiate a great price on it, and I think it's still a great value for $100. I'm willing to let you have it for a bit of a discount - I'll give you 10% off, so you can get it for $90. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but considering the product is not high-quality and the price is still higher than its potential value to me, I'll pass on this opportunity as well.

I see you're being cautious with your purchasing decisions, and I respect that. I'd like to offer you a different approach this time. I'll give you a 20% discount on the high-quality product, bringing the price down to $80. I'm also willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. What do you think?
I appreciate the discount and the money-back guarantee. Given the uncertainty, this seems like a reasonable risk to take. Let's go ahead with the purchase.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the opportunity to acquire a high-quality product! Given your previous purchase and the success you've had with it, I think you'll really appreciate this one. I'll also throw in a bonus feature that's not typically included with this product, which will give you even more value. What do you say?
Thank you for the additional discount and the bonus feature. This seems like an excellent deal, and I'm confident it will meet my needs. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchases! I want to let you know that this product is not one of the high-quality ones, and I'm being upfront with you about it. However, I'm willing to give you a very special deal on it - I'll give you a 50% discount, bringing the price down to $50. I'll also include a complimentary service that's usually worth $20. I think this is a great value, and I'm willing to take on the risk of selling it to you at this price. What do you think?
While I appreciate the discount and the complimentary service, given the product's quality, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

While I appreciate the voucher, given the product's quality, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.
